Just a moment please...

  • Designed + Developed
    By Dave Gamache
    Inspired by Ian Coyle

  • No More
    Classes.

    Don't get me wrong - I love learning and Santa Clara University is the best, but I didn't enjoy having to chug Monsters and pull all nighters for classes I wasn't interested in.

  • Got Hired By ZURB.

    How lucky can I get? Straight out of college I got an awesome job at ZURB doing what I love. I get to work with awesome companies like Netflix, Salesforce, eBay, Evite and so many more.

  • Went To The
    Bahamas.

    As a graduation gift to myself I went to the Bahamas with my lovely girlfriend Ashley, best friend Dave and his lady. First time off U.S. soil. It was beautiful.

  • http://i.learned
    .to/code

    I started this past year with decent coding skills, but now I'm a front-end ninja! This year I took HTML5, CSS3 & jQuery head-on and loved every minute. Some non-client projects I completed this year were:

    • Orbit: The world's hottest jQuery slider
    • Clue: A fun app to create memory test about a site
    • DaveGamache.com: My personal blog + playground
    • AshleyBatz.com: Photography site for m'lady's shots
    • Raptorize: Animated velociraptor jQuery plugin

  • Games +
    Media.

    • Braid: Platforming + Time Control = One of the Top 5 Games of My Life
    • Inception: Dark Knight + The Matrix = Yes Please!
    • Mashups: Girl Talk, Norwegian Recycling, Super Mash Bros, Ghetto Sunrise, Milkman...

  • I Started Sketching Again.

    When I was a kid I really wanted to be an animator, but now I make do with watching Pixar movies. Just this year I started sketching little monsters and critters again. I'm not the best, but I love it.

  • Being A
    Grown Up

    Now, let me be clear here - this means I am excited to have the freedom (in many senses of the word) to travel, buy stuff I've always wanted and to do whatever I please...this does not mean I want to be more mature.

    I still laugh at farts. Everytime.
